quoteFirst: Meanwhile the Brigade was gradually being compelled to give ground and, owing to its lack of bombs, to loose its slender hold on the enemy's positions. quoteLast: they were finally ejected from the German lines and withdrew to the British trenches.

quoteFirst: George tore the note into fragments and flung them into the paper-basket. It was
quoteLast: . Glad of any excuse to be out of business and its cares, he hastened things away in his room, and left it. There were moments when George was tempted heartily to wish himself out of it for good, safe in some unapproachable island, too remote from civilization to be visited by the world.

quoteLast: the sails were hoisted, the English flag was run up to the peak; the passengers took a last look at the quays in the hope of descrying Passe-partout, but they were disappointed.
